title: Week 13's Daily Fantasy Lineup and Giving Thanks for Andy Dalton  | The Dantasy Football Podcast
description:
We invest our daily fantasy money into Patrick Mahomes and the Chiefs offense this week, debate whether or not to use any Rams players against the Cardinals, buy in on the new-look Bengals with old faithful Andy Dalton, and offer up our bargain-bin players of the week before building our daily fantasy lineup for Week 13.
Hosts: Danny Heifetz, Danny Kelly, and Craig Horlbeck

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
